project.heading: Portfolio Admin
project.htmlContent: The admin project is a sophisticated content management system designed to manage and oversee my personal portfolio website. It handles dynamic interactions, ensuring efficient data processing, seamless communication with the frontend, and reliable CI/CD pipelines, which keep the portfolio's lab site up-to-date and responsive. Also manages the data for the main page of the portfolio, including Projects Showcase, Badges, Etc. The admin panel itself is designed to provide a centralized and user-friendly interface for content management. Through this combination of microservices architecture, serverless backend services, secure access management, and cost-effective hosting, the project showcases my technical expertise in backend development, serverless computing, DevOps practices, and securing modern web applications while ensuring scalability and maintainability.
